UIFillMode = enum
  FM_TILE, FM_STRETCH, FM_NONE
UISprite = object of Sprite
  renderSecs: array[0 .. 2, array[0 .. 2, Rect]]
  center: Rect
  fillMode: UIFillMode
  scale: Vector2
a ui sprite, renders in 8 elements
